dc_title_s: Country south of the Ganges, from Calcutta to Benares : compiled from the Revenue Survey based on the Great Trigonometrical Operations to 1859
dc_description_s: Compiled in the office of the surveyer general of India, January, 1860.|79 x 145 Centimeters|Scale 1:506,880. "Scale 8 miles to 1 inch."|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
